overview:
Kunal is co-founder and CEO of Lumos Labs. Prior to founding Lumos Labs, Kunal co-founded the private equity fund AIMLP, which manages over $400MM in capital. The fund focuses on investments in infrastructure and natural resources. Prior to founding AIMLP, Kunal was Vice President at McCown De Leeuw and Co., a $1.2bil private equity fund making growth equity investments. At McCown, Kunal was deeply involved in the structuring and IPO of StoneMor (STON), the first time a company was restructured into a Master Limited Partnership in the industry.

Prior to McCown, Kunal worked in the Strategic Planning and Development group at the Walt Disney Company. At Disney, Kunal was involved in the development of Disney’s acquisition strategy and over $5bil of M&A transactions. Kunal graduated magna cum laude from Princeton University with a B.A. in Economics and a certificate in Finance.
